name: kdrm-query-layers
label: KDRM Query Layers
author: Shakhrillo
description: This is a KDRM Query Layers widget. It allows users to perform queries on the map and display the results. The widget is designed to be user-friendly and integrates seamlessly with other KDRM widgets. It includes features such as customizable query parameters, result display options, and integration with other KDRM tools.
